    About

    Hi, guys! The website you are previewing is a demonstration for Pintereso Jekyll theme and it is hosted on Github pages. There are various ways you can use Pintereso with your Jekyll website. Here are some of them:

    • blogging
    • curated resources
    • affiliate marketing
    • resume
    • portfolio
    • photography

    Features

    • 100% Github Pages Compatibility
    • Bootstrap 4.x
    • SEO Integration
    • Search
    • Categories
    • Prev/Next Post
    • Pagination
    • Disqus Comments
    • Sitemap
    • Feed
    • Formspree Contact Form
    • Pinterest, AddThis, Google Analytics
    • Font Awesome 5+
    • Cookie Consent & Privacy Policy

    Made with by Sal @wowthemesnet. Thanks for your support!
